text.section: A parent, guardian or other person legally charged with the care or custody of a minor is guilty of endangering the welfare of a minor when he fails or refuses to exercise reasonable diligence in the control of such child to prevent him from becoming a neglected, dependent or delinquent child.
Endangering the welfare of a minor is a Class A misdemeanor.

law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 262, effective January 1, 1975.
